titles.title: 309 There Is A Safe And Secret Place (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a safe
And secret place
Beneath the
Wings divine
Reserved for all
The heirs of grace
O be that refuge mine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The least
And feeblest
There may bide
Uninjured and unawed
While thousands fall on every side
He rests secure in God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He feeds in pastures large and fair
Of love
And truth divine
O child of God O glory's heir
How rich a lot is thine

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
A hand almighty to defend
An ear for every call
An honored life a peaceful end
And Heaven to crown it all
